Subskills.name: Lasting Roots
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of earth bind.

Subskills.name: Sharp Oaks
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by earth bind.

Subskills.name: Field of Roots
Subskills.description: Area of effect and damage is greatly increased, but earth bind is now cast at your feet.

Subskills.name: Nature's Intellect
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of earth bind.

Subskills.name: Increased Pressure
Subskills.description: Monsters killed by earth bind explode, dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Rooting Wave
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash additional earth binds on cast.

Subskills.name: Expanding Roots
Subskills.description: Chance for earth bind to grow on hit.

Subskills.name: Lingering Oak
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect of earth bind.

Subskills.name: Quick Strangulation
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of earth bind.

Subskills.name: Poisonous Ivy
Subskills.description: Increases poisoned damage of earth bind.

Subskills.name: Paralyzing Leaves
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Wildfire Growth
Subskills.description: Chance to send a trail of hellfire towards targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Shattering Thorns
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt, inflicting elemental break on hit.
